author: cnbc.com
title: BuildGroup, Inc. names Dana Seabury as Business Development Manager for Interiors
text:
SAN FRANCISCO, Feb. 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- BuildGroup, Inc. today announced the hiring of Dana Seabury as Business Development Manager for Interiors. In her new role, Ms. Seabury will be responsible for driving new business initiatives for high-end interiors for the San Francisco-based general contracting firm, which in three consecutive years has been named one of the Bay Area's Fastest Growing Private Companies as well as one of its Best Places to Work.
"We are honored to have Dana join the BuildGroup family for the next phase in her career," said BuildGroup CEO Ross Edwards. "Dana's proven track record in the industry allows her the freedom to work anywhere, and we couldn't be happier that she has chosen BuildGroup. Her deep knowledge of the San Francisco market will be useful as BuildGroup grows its interiors division."
Dana Seabury's career has provided her the opportunity to work in all key areas of the real estate and construction industries. Her leadership in guiding project teams through the entire life-cycle of high-end developments will be a tremendous asset to BuildGroup's interiors division.
"I'm excited to join BuildGroup and bring my business development and relationship management experience to the team," Dana said. "BuildGroup has had tremendous growth over the last decade and I look forward to working with this talented team."
Dana holds a B.A. in Business, Communications, and Economics from the University of California, Davis. She is active in SPUR's Young Urbanist Community and currently resides in San Francisco.
About BuildGroup, Inc. BuildGroup is a general contractor focused on providing a high level of service to its clientele. With its in-depth understanding of clients' business needs and commitment to providing principal-level involvement on all projects, BuildGroup has grown consistently since its inception. The employee-owned company has been named a Largest Commercial Contractor in the Bay Area, a Healthiest Employer, a Fastest Growing Private Company, and a Best Place to Work in the Bay Area. As a preferred builder and trusted partner in every market it serves, its mission statement is: "WE BUILD: Values…People…Trust."
For more information, visit BuildGroup, Inc. on the web at http://www.buildgc.com .
